name: .CMREC
summary: Learn about .CMREC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CMREC file in previous versions of Camtasia for Mac (by selecting File → Import → Media). Camtasia 2019 is the last version that supports CMREC files.

You can use the Mac versions of Camtasia 2019 and earlier versions to convert a CMREC file to the .MP4 format. (If you own a newer version of Camtasia, you can download these previous versions for free from TechSmith's website.) To do so, open the file in Camtasia, and then export it as an MP4 file.
